messages.message:
Do rotation corrections during process files ever translate the character coordinates back into the original orientation? Looking at the doc below, it seems like this is not the case:
https://dogfood.instabase.com/apps/ocr/review-doc/ib_solutions/solutions/fs/Instabase%20Drive/poc/jpmc/demo-3/financial-spreading/samples/run_vontell/2019-06-21-14:03:17/ed39c3f7-c8ff-4587-8273-764d1ffe537a/out/s4_merge_files/out.ibocr?i=0&ibflowresults=
